QuestData.Title: Bigger Trap, Better Rewards
QuestData.Description: Ah, commander, it is good to see you again. With the materials we have gathered here in Draenor, we have been able to construct a trap strong enough to immobilize even the mightiest beast.$B$BThese enormous creatures can be found on the western side of Nagrand, among the most fertile plains.$B$BA word of warning: these beasts are great and powerful. You may want to bring some friends along.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Deadly Iron Trap to capture a Ironhide Bull, Direfang Alpha, or Wetland Trampler.
